short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An open source project with a simple goal: to help French/English learners improve their vocabulary, one new browser tab at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn a new French word each time you open a new tab  :D
Apprenez un nouveau mot anglais chaque fois que vous ouvrez un nouvel tab :D
